"True" is a song by the English band Spandau Ballet. It was released on 14 April 
1983 as the third single from their third studio album of the same name. The song 
was written by band member Gary Kemp. The song was a huge worldwide hit, 
peaking at number one in the UK Singles Chart on 30 April 1983 for four ... It is 
Spandau Ballet's biggest hit and their only major hit in the U.S., reaching...
